methods.name: size()
methods.description: Returns number of nodes in SinglyLinkedList instance.

methods.name: sizeRecursive(node = this.head)
methods.description: Returns number of nodes in SinglyLinkedList instance(recursively).

methods.name: print()
methods.description: Prints each node in SinglyLinkedList instance to console.

methods.name: getLast()
methods.description: Returns last node in SinglyLinkedList instance.

methods.name: push(data)
methods.description: Creates new node with data parameter and adds to beginning to SinglyLinkedList.

methods.name: append(data)
methods.description: Creates new node with data parameter and adds to end of SinglyLinkedList.

methods.name: insertAfter(prevNode, data)
methods.description: Creates new node with data parameter and inserts after prevNode parameter.

methods.name: deleteNodeWithMatchingKey(key)
methods.description: Given a 'key', delete the first occurrence of this key in the SinglyLinkedList.

methods.name: deleteNodeAtPosition(position)
methods.description: Deletes node at zero-indexed position in SinglyLinkedList instance.

methods.name: search(key)
methods.description: Checks whether the a node with matching key is present in SinglyLinkedList instance.

methods.name: getNth(index)
methods.description: Returns data of node at index 'n'.

methods.name: getNthRecursive(node = this.head, index)
methods.description: Returns data of node at index 'n'(recursively).

methods.name: reverse()
methods.description: Reverse order of nodes in SinglyLinkedList instance.
